description: Seed skills for Skillsmith. realSkills contain verified skills from real GitHub repositories suitable for production sync. testFixtures contain fake skills with fictional skillsmith-community/skillsmith-labs URLs for unit testing only - these should NOT be synced to production.
licenseNote: All skills listed here have compatible open source licenses. Anthropic document skills (docx, pdf, pptx, xlsx) are excluded as they are source-available, not open source.

realSkills.name: commit
realSkills.description: Generate semantic commit messages following conventional commits. Analyzes staged changes and creates meaningful commit messages with proper type prefixes.
realSkills.author: anthropic

realSkills.name: review-pr
realSkills.description: Review pull requests with detailed code analysis. Provides comprehensive feedback on code quality, security, and best practices.
realSkills.author: anthropic

realSkills.name: create-pr
realSkills.description: Create well-documented pull requests with summaries. Automatically generates PR descriptions from commit history.
realSkills.author: anthropic

realSkills.name: hugging-face-cli
realSkills.description: Execute Hugging Face Hub operations using the hf CLI. Download models/datasets, upload files, manage repos, and run cloud compute jobs.
realSkills.author: huggingface

realSkills.name: hugging-face-datasets
realSkills.description: Create and manage datasets on Hugging Face Hub with support for configs, streaming updates, and SQL-based transformations.
realSkills.author: huggingface

realSkills.name: hugging-face-evaluation
realSkills.description: Add and manage evaluation results in Hugging Face model cards with imports from external APIs and custom evaluation runs.
realSkills.author: huggingface

realSkills.name: hugging-face-jobs
realSkills.description: Execute Python scripts and manage scheduled compute jobs on Hugging Face infrastructure.
realSkills.author: huggingface

realSkills.name: hugging-face-model-trainer
realSkills.description: Fine-tune language models using TRL on Hugging Face Jobs, covering SFT, DPO, GRPO methods plus GGUF conversion and cost estimation.
realSkills.author: huggingface

realSkills.name: hugging-face-paper-publisher
realSkills.description: Publish and manage research papers on Hugging Face Hub with authorship claims and markdown article generation.
realSkills.author: huggingface

realSkills.name: hugging-face-tool-builder
realSkills.description: Build reusable scripts for chaining Hugging Face API calls and automating repeated tasks.
realSkills.author: huggingface

realSkills.name: hugging-face-trackio
realSkills.description: Track ML experiments with metric logging via Python API and real-time dashboard syncing to HF Spaces.
realSkills.author: huggingface

realSkills.name: react-best-practices
realSkills.description: React and Next.js performance optimization guidelines from Vercel Engineering with over 40 rules across 8 categories for component optimization, data fetching, and bundle size reduction.
realSkills.author: vercel

realSkills.name: web-design-guidelines
realSkills.description: UI code auditing against 100+ rules covering accessibility, performance, and UX across 11 categories including forms, animations, images, and internationalization.
realSkills.author: vercel

realSkills.name: vercel-deploy-claimable
realSkills.description: Deploy applications directly to Vercel with auto-detection of 40+ frameworks from package.json. Returns preview and claim URLs for ownership transfer.
realSkills.author: vercel

testFixtures.name: jest-helper
testFixtures.description: Generate Jest test cases for React components and TypeScript functions. Supports mocking, snapshot testing, and coverage analysis.
testFixtures.author: community

testFixtures.name: vitest-helper
testFixtures.description: Generate Vitest test cases with modern ESM support. Includes component testing, mocking utilities, and coverage configuration.
testFixtures.author: community

testFixtures.name: docker-compose
testFixtures.description: Generate and manage Docker Compose configurations. Supports multi-service setups, networking, and volume management.
testFixtures.author: community

testFixtures.name: prisma-generator
testFixtures.description: Generate Prisma schemas and migrations from existing databases or requirements. Includes type-safe client generation.
testFixtures.author: community

testFixtures.name: api-docs
testFixtures.description: Generate OpenAPI/Swagger documentation from code comments and TypeScript types. Supports REST and GraphQL APIs.
testFixtures.author: community

testFixtures.name: security-scan
testFixtures.description: Scan code for security vulnerabilities and provide remediation suggestions. Detects OWASP Top 10 issues.
testFixtures.author: community

testFixtures.name: workflow-builder
testFixtures.description: Create GitHub Actions workflows with best practices. Supports CI/CD, testing, and deployment pipelines.
testFixtures.author: community

testFixtures.name: react-component
testFixtures.description: Generate React components with TypeScript, styling, and tests. Supports functional components and hooks.
testFixtures.author: community

testFixtures.name: express-api
testFixtures.description: Generate Express.js API endpoints with validation, error handling, and documentation.
testFixtures.author: community

testFixtures.name: graphql-schema
testFixtures.description: Generate GraphQL schemas and resolvers from TypeScript types. Includes subscription support.
testFixtures.author: community

testFixtures.name: llm-prompt-tester
testFixtures.description: Test and iterate on LLM prompts with automated evaluation. Supports A/B testing and prompt versioning.
testFixtures.author: experimental

testFixtures.name: code-refactor
testFixtures.description: Suggest and apply code refactoring patterns. Detects code smells and proposes improvements.
testFixtures.author: experimental

testFixtures.name: untested-tool
testFixtures.description: A newly submitted skill that has not yet been reviewed or assessed. Use with caution and review the source code before using.
testFixtures.author: unknown-contributor
